data.label: CFCA Reinforcement
data.description: CFCA Security Reinforcement provides comprehensive security for enterprise mobile clients to prevent risks such as application cracking, tampering, data theft, and core data leakage after deployment. It also ensures compliance with security standards.

data.label: CFCA 加固
data.description: CFCA 安全加固为企业移动客户端提供全面的安全保障，避免上线后移动客户端应用程序被破解、篡改和窃取、核心数据泄漏等安全风险。并为企业提供安全检测合规性保障。
